items.name: Default Interpretation

items.card_blurb: Clear, balanced interpretations focused on emotional meaning and personal context.
tone_examples: This dream seems to reflect an emotion thatâ€™s been lingering rather than a specific event.
This kind of dream often shows up when something in waking life feels unresolved or uncertain.
Your mind may be processing a familiar concern in an unfamiliar way to get your attention.
